mapper.update:
update outpt_triage_visit
register_id =#{registerId} ,
visit_id =#{visitId} ,
dq_id =#{dqId} ,
triage_id =#{triageId} ,
triage_name =#{triageName} ,
triage_no =#{triageNo} ,
clinic_id =#{clinicId} ,
doctor_id =#{doctorId} ,
doctor_name =#{doctorName} ,
clinic_name =#{clinicName} ,
dept_id =#{deptId} ,
dept_name =#{deptName} ,
sort_no =#{sortNo} ,
name =#{name} ,
triage_start_code =#{triageStartCode} ,
is_call =#{isCall} ,
call_time =#{callTime} ,
call_number =#{callNumber} ,
is_loss =#{isLoss} ,
loss_time =#{lossTime} ,
remark =#{remark} ,
triage_peo_id =#{triagePeoId} ,
triage_peo_name =#{triagePeoName} ,
triage_peo_time =#{triagePeoTime} ,
where id = #{id}

update outpt_triage_visit
call_number = CONVERT(CONVERT(ifNULL(call_number,0),SIGNED)+1,CHAR),
dq_id =#{dqId} ,
triage_id =#{triageId} ,
triage_name =#{triageName} ,
triage_no =#{triageNo} ,
clinic_id =#{clinicId} ,
doctor_id =#{doctorId} ,
triage_start_code =#{triageStartCode} ,
doctor_name =#{doctorName} ,
clinic_name =#{clinicName} ,
dept_id =#{deptId} ,
dept_name =#{deptName} ,
sort_no =#{sortNo} ,
name =#{name} ,
triage_start_code =#{triageStartCode} ,
is_call =#{isCall} ,
call_time =#{callTime} ,
call_number =#{callNumber} ,
is_loss =#{isLoss} ,
loss_time =#{lossTime} ,
remark =#{remark} ,
triage_peo_id =#{triagePeoId} ,
triage_peo_name =#{triagePeoName} ,
triage_peo_time =#{triagePeoTime} ,
where register_id = #{registerId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

update outpt_triage_visit
dq_id =#{dqId} ,
triage_id =#{triageId} ,
triage_name =#{triageName} ,
triage_no =#{triageNo} ,
clinic_id =#{clinicId} ,
doctor_id =#{doctorId} ,
triage_start_code =#{triageStartCode} ,
doctor_name =#{doctorName} ,
clinic_name =#{clinicName} ,
dept_id =#{deptId} ,
dept_name =#{deptName} ,
sort_no =#{sortNo} ,
name =#{name} ,
triage_start_code =#{triageStartCode} ,
is_call =#{isCall} ,
call_time =#{callTime} ,
call_number =#{callNumber} ,
is_loss =#{isLoss} ,
loss_time =#{lossTime} ,
remark =#{remark} ,
triage_peo_id =#{triagePeoId} ,
triage_peo_name =#{triagePeoName} ,
triage_peo_time =#{triagePeoTime} ,
where register_id = #{registerId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.hosp_code, a.register_id, a.visit_id, a.dq_id, a.doctor_id, a.doctor_name, a.clinic_id, ifnull( a.clinic_name, bc.NAME ) AS clinic_name, a.triage_id, a.triage_name, a.triage_no, ifnull( a.sort_no, 0 ) AS sort_no, a.NAME, a.triage_start_code, a.is_call, a.call_time, a.call_number, ifnull( a.is_loss, '0' ) AS is_loss, a.loss_time, a.remark, a.triage_peo_id, a.triage_peo_name, a.triage_peo_time, a.crte_id, a.crte_name, a.crte_time, a.dept_id, a.dept_name, b.visit_no, date( c.register_time ) AS register_time, b.age, b.age_unit_code, b.gender_code AS sex, b.cert_no, DATE_FORMAT( b.birthday, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS birthday, b.marry_code, b.patient_code, b.phone FROM outpt_triage_visit a left join outpt_visit b on a.visit_id = b.id left join outpt_register c on a.register_id = c.id left join base_clinic bc on a.clinic_id = bc.id WHERE a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND a.register_id = #{registerId}

SELECT su.*, tmp.clinic_id FROM sys_user su,(SELECT b.doctor_id ,b.clinic_id FROM outpt_classes_queue a, outpt_doctor_queue b WHERE a.hosp_code=b.hosp_code and a.id = b.cq_id AND a.queue_date = date (#{queueDate}) AND b.clinic_id = #{clinicId} ) tmp WHERE su.id IN (tmp.doctor_id) and status_code ='0'
select id,`name`,`number`,address from base_clinic where id =#{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

SELECT `id`,`hosp_code`,`register_id`,`visit_id`,`triage_no`,`doctor_id`,`dept_id`, `dept_name`,`sort_no` FROM outpt_triage_visit where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and register_id = #{registerId} for update
mapper.update: update outpt_triage_visit set clinic_id =#{clinicId} , set doctor_id =#{doctorId} , set doctor_name =#{doctorName} , set clinic_name =#{clinicName} , set triage_start_code = '2' , set is_call = '0' , set call_time = null, set call_number = 0 , set is_loss = '0' , set loss_time = null, set remark =#{remark} where id = #{id}
